flavorText: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

foreignData.flavorText: „Diese hinterwäldlerischen Welten sind so voller Ignoranz. Ich werde sie erziehen. Entweder hören sie mir zu, oder sie sterben."
foreignData.name: Magister-Sphinx
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Magister-Sphinx ins Spiel kommt, wird der Lebenspunktestand eines Spielers deiner Wahl genau 10.

foreignData.flavorText: "Estos nuevos mundos están llenos de ignorancia. Los educaré. Me escucharán, o morirán."
foreignData.name: Esfinge magíster
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando la Esfinge magíster entre en juego, el total de vidas del jugador objetivo es 10.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ces mondes sont tous plongés dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Je vais les éduquer. Ils devront m'écouter ou mourir. »
foreignData.name: Magister sphinx
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand le Magister sphinx arrive en jeu, le total de points de vie du joueur ciblé devient 10.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quei regni oscuri sono colmi di ignoranza. Sarò io ad educarli. Mi ascolteranno, o periranno tutti."
foreignData.name: Sfinge Magister
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando la Sfinge Magister entra in gioco, i punti vita di un giocatore bersaglio diventano 10.

foreignData.flavorText: 「この未開の世界は無知に満ちている。 私が教えを下そう。 聞く耳が無ければ死ぬだけだ。」
foreignData.name: 厳然たるスフィンクス
foreignData.text:
飛行
厳然たるスフィンクスが場に出たとき、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーのライフは10点になる。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — スフィンクス

foreignData.flavorText: "Esses mundos obscuros estão repletos de ignorância. Tratarei de ensinar-lhes. Eles ouvirão, ou então morrerão."
foreignData.name: Esfinge Catedrática
foreignData.text:
Voar
Quando Esfinge Catedrática entra em jogo, o total de vida do jogador alvo torna-se 10.

foreignData.flavorText: «Эти отсталые миры погрязли в невежестве. Придется их обучить. Либо они будут меня слушать, либо должны будут умереть».
foreignData.name: Сфинкс-Магистр
foreignData.text:
Полет
Когда Сфинкс-Магистр входит в игру, количество жизней целевого игрока становится равным 10.

foreignData.flavorText: 「这些黑暗世界尽是无知愚昧。 我将教化他们。 他们必得听令，否则便是寻死。」
foreignData.name: 范师史芬斯
foreignData.text:
飞行
当范师史芬斯进场时，目标牌手的总生命成为10。

name: Magister Sphinx
originalText:
Flying
When Magister Sphinx comes into play, target player's life total becomes 10.

rulings.text: For a player’s life total to become 10, what actually happens is that the player gains or loses the appropriate amount of life. For example, if the targeted player’s life total is 4 when this ability resolves, it will cause that player to gain 6 life; alternately, if the targeted player’s life total is 17 when this ability resolves, it will cause that player to lose 7 life. Other cards that interact with life gain or life loss will interact with this effect accordingly.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, this ability basically causes the team’s life total to become 10, but only the targeted player is considered to have actually gained or lost life.

text:
Flying
When Magister Sphinx enters the battlefield, target player's life total becomes 10.
